channel.title: Diego Mellizo | Game Developer
channel.description: Recent content on Diego Mellizo | Game Developer

item.title: Means of transport
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collaboration with Mecca 2017 Genre: Educational video game, puzzle. Description: The main mechanic is to spin the roulette and then complete a jigsaw puzzle of the selected vehicle. Designed to reinforce the auditory language development in children, it contains voice recordings in several languages that can be heard during the game.

item.title: Tank Blast Arena 2D
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: 2017 - 2019 Play on simmer.io Genre: Tank shooter, 2D top-down view. Description: Multiplayer game supporting up to 20 concurrent users (CCU). Deathmatch mode, aka free-for-all. It includes AI-driven tanks (in gray color) to compensate for the absence of players.

item.title: Racing
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collaboration with Mecca 2017 Genre: Auto-runner. Description: Travel as many kilometers as you can before the time runs out. Collect power capsules which add time and avoid the barriers as they subtract time.

item.title: Defender
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collaboration with Mecca 2017 Genre: Tower defense. Similar to Plants vs. Zombies. Description: Defend your shop from some common enemies of your business, do it by placing gems on the lanes, they will summon characters with unique superpowers to help you defeat the bad guys.

item.title: Airplane
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collaboration with Mecca 2018 Genre: Falling objects. Description: Fly your plane and catch the falling boxes to get points. Avoid the boxes with explosives, as they will take your points away!

item.title: Trivia
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collaboration with Mecca 2018 Genre: Quiz, puzzle. Description: Read carefully each question, then drag your character through the bank towards one of the possible answers at the top. Be careful as colliding with obstacles, falling into holes, being hit by thieves or responding incorrectly will make you lose a life and return to the starting position.

item.title: Slicer
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collaboration with Mecca 2018 Genre: Arcade, fruit-slicer. Similar to Fruit Ninja. Description: Cut and pop the colored capsules to get points. Avoid popping the white capsules, as they will remove any capsules currently on the screen and prevent new ones from appearing for a moment.

item.title: Skate
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collaboration with Mecca 2018 Genre: Falling objects. Description: Slide over the ramp from one side to the other while collecting as many hamburgers and drinks as you can to get points, do so before the time goes off.

item.title: Bicycle
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collaboration with Mecca 2018 Genre: Platformer, auto-runner. Description: Drive your bicycle through the (randomly generated) track along the beach while collecting as many soda cans and trophies as you can to get points, you can single-jump or double-jump to do so.

item.title: Simon
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collaboration with Mecca 2019 Genre: Memory game. Similar to the electronic game Simon. Description: Pay attention to the color and the sound of the sequences and then repeat them yourself.

item.title: Words
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collaboration with Mecca 2019 Genre: Word puzzle. Description: Read the hint at the top and complete the empty spaces in the middle by dragging letters from the available ones at the bottom.

item.title: Sticky Flee
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collaboration with Mecca 2017 - 2019 Genre: Puzzle. Description: It is set in a laboratory where a gelatinous alien, called Sticky, is being detained, he splits into two playable characters as he tries to escape using the pipelines.
